name: BookmarkBuddy
0:
”Alexa, ask Bookmark Buddy to bookmark page 124 of The Hobbit.”
”Alexa, ask Bookmark Buddy where I left off.”
”Alexa, ask Bookmark Buddy to move my bookmark.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bookmark buddy
des: Bookmark Buddy saves your page for you. No more folded page corners!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
